channel.title: The quest for Gennocide by N2
channel.description:
# Here is the challange!
I am going to try to find a way to have a wipeout draw happen by the **start** of N2 Rules: The starting classes and who targets who is chosen by me but it needs to be possable by the rules of the game as of 1.0.6.
Current proposal:
Class list:
Evil king Prince Priest Knight Knight Drunk Drunk Obs Obs Hunter CL Ritualist Possessor Alch Alch
First of all the ritualist empowers the CL The CL attacks the Priest The drunks visit the Priest the Obs's visits the priest as well Both Alch's attack eachother The Possessor attacks the Prince with the Priest Both knights Guard Priest killing the CL and eachother (I dont think this stops the visitors from dying)
Durring the day the hunter is executed killing the last cult leaving just the king alive. This however is not enough. How do I get the king to die too?

item.title: The quest for Gennocide by N2
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

I’d like to take a look at this again real quick with the current patch to see where we are in terms of this:

Evil King
Prince
Hunter
SheriffX2
ObsX3
Princess X3
CL
Invoker
Reaper
Alch
Alch

Reaper uses CoD on Prince
CL Eradicates Reaper and Prince
Alch’s bomb Prince (no stoneskin)
All BD invests visit prince
Invoker occs prince
Next day King votes up Hunter and gets arrowed.

It’s now possible

Now replace hunter with pretender who stabs the evil king for everyone to lose the game since hunter can’t be killed apparently

Read full topic
